name: Apple Harvester
description:
Apple Harvester

In this game you need to catch and gather as many apples as you can!
Fill up your cascet and bring it to the apple crates located on the edges of the map.
You get bonus points for delivering a full cascet.
Catching apples midair grants also a bonus. 
You can sprint, you recover sprintenergy slowly as you walk or quicker by standing still. 
Worms will try to eat your apples. Run over them to squish them!
Will you be able to beat my highscore of 685?

Controls:

LEFT: A
RIGHT: D
SPRINT: SHIFT
